# ListExtensions.TryGetValue&lt;T&gt; method

Try returns item in specified index. If index is not valid value is null (Nothing in Visual Basic)

```csharp
public static bool TryGetValue<T>(this List<T> items, int index, ref T value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type element |
| items | Target list |
| index | Reference index |
| value | Item |
